history.title: About Casino du Lac-Leamy
history.description2: Casino du Lac-Leamy is a luxury entertainment complex in Gatineau, Canada, offering over 1,800 slot machines, dozens of poker and table games, a live show theater, Hilton hotel, spa, and fine dining. The casino is known for massive jackpots — up to $2.5 million — and generous player bonuses.

customHtml.title: Casino du Lac-Leamy: Excitement and Luxury
customHtml.description:
Casino du Lac-Leamy is one of Canada’s most prestigious entertainment complexes, located in the scenic Gatineau area, just minutes from downtown Ottawa. It blends excitement, comfort, and style, offering guests a unique combination of casino, hotel, fine dining, and live entertainment .


The casino spans over 70,000 square feet and features more than 1,800 slot machines, including classic slots, video slots, and progressive jackpots. It also offers over 60 live dealer tables, including blackjack, roulette, baccarat, poker, and other popular games. Poker enthusiasts can enjoy a dedicated poker room with 16 tables, open 24/7 on weekends. A special highlight is The Zone — an interactive space with 50 electronic terminals, where guests can play together in a vibrant light-and-sound atmosphere.


The adjacent Hilton Lac-Leamy Hotel offers over 300 rooms and suites, including access to the Amerispa wellness center, indoor and outdoor pools, a fitness room, and the lake. Guests can choose from various packages: romantic dinners, spa treatments, golf tours, or casino chip nights.


The property features four bars and five restaurants. Among them are Le Baccara, known for its award-winning fine cuisine, and Arôme, which serves seafood, grilled meats, and local delicacies. Bar 7 is the nightlife hub, hosting themed parties, live performances, DJ sets, and mini blackjack tournaments. Every Friday and Saturday features live music, while Thursdays are dedicated to Latin dance nights.


Entertainment includes concerts, theatrical performances, and shows at the Théâtre du Casino, a 1,100-seat venue. Both local artists and international stars perform here, including tribute shows and symphonic programs.


The Casino Privilèges Club loyalty program offers four tiers, from Basic to Prestige Plus. Players earn points for every bet — $1 on slots equals 1 point. To reach Prestige Plus, one must earn 400,000 points annually, equivalent to $400,000 in wagers. Members receive exclusive offers, discounts, invitations to private events, and personalized bonuses.


Casino du Lac-Leamy is more than just a gaming destination — it’s a full-scale resort where everyone can find something to enjoy: from thrilling games and gourmet dining to relaxation and cultural experiences. It’s the perfect place for a weekend getaway, vacation, or unforgettable night out.


Casino du Lac-Leamy – Visitor Rules and Regulations


Age Restrictions

  • • Entry is allowed only for guests aged 18 and over.
  • • A valid photo ID is required at the entrance.

Dress Code

  • • No formal dress code, but neat attire is recommended.
  • • Flip-flops, beachwear, and athletic clothing may be inappropriate during evening hours.

Personal Belongings & Security

  • • Helmets, large bags, and backpacks must be checked or stored in lockers.
  • • Photography and video recording inside the casino are prohibited without permission.

Currency & Betting

  • • Both Canadian and U.S. currency are accepted.
  • • Minimum bets start at $0.01 on slots.

Operating Hours

  • • Casino hours: Sunday–Thursday: 9:00 AM – 3:00 AM Friday–Saturday: 9:00 AM – 5:00 AM
  • • Table games: Mon–Thu: 11:00 AM – 12:00 AM Fri: until 2:00 AM Sat–Sun: 10:00 AM – 2:00 AM.

Casino Privilèges Club: Casino du Lac-Leamy Loyalty Program

Casino du Lac-Leamy offers its guests an exclusive loyalty program — the Casino Privilèges Club, designed to make every visit more rewarding and enjoyable. Membership gives access to bonuses, discounts, personalized offers, and special privileges.


Membership Levels

The program includes four tiers, each offering increasing benefits:

  • • Casino Privilèges — basic level, available upon registration.
  • • Privilèges Plus — from 35,000 points.
  • • Prestige — from 35,000 points with additional conditions.
  • • Prestige Plus — from 400,000 points per year (equivalent to $400,000 in wagers).

Points are earned for every bet: $1 on slots or video poker = 1 point


Member Benefits

  • • Up to 15% discounts at restaurants and bars.
  • • Discounts on concert and show tickets.
  • • Exclusive offers for stays at Hilton Lac-Leamy.
  • • Invitations to private events and VIP promotions.
  • • Personalized bonuses and gifts.
  • • Entry into special draws and tournaments.

How to Earn Points?

Points are awarded for casino activity and purchases:

  • • Slot machines and video poker: 1 point for every CAD spent
  • • Table games: Points based on an internal system considering bets and playtime
  • • Restaurants, bars, and hotel: Points for every purchase
  • • Special promotions and tournaments: Extra points for participation

customHtml_2.title: Entertainment & Events at Casino du Lac-Leamy
customHtml_2.description:
Casino du Lac-Leamy Promotions

Casino du Lac-Leamy, located in Gatineau near Ottawa, is not just about gaming—it’s a full entertainment experience. From luxury hotel packages to seasonal events and dining deals, the casino offers a wide range of promotions designed to make your visit unforgettable.


Hotel Packages: Stay & Play in Style

  • • Le Sorcier Golf Package – Overnight stay at Hilton Lac-Leamy plus a round of golf at one of Canada’s top courses.
  • • Arôme Package – Three-course dinner at Arôme restaurant, overnight stay, and breakfast.
  • • Bed & Breakfast – Simple and elegant: a night at Hilton with breakfast included.
  • • Casino Night Package – Includes accommodation, breakfast, and gaming credits.
  • • Amerispa Serenity Package – Massage, foot care, and spa access.
  • • Amerispa Indulgence Package – Massage, facial treatment, and water zone access.

Seasonal & Themed Events

  • • Halloween Party – Spooky fun on October 31 and November 1.
  • • Bonus Hands Promo – Win up to $500 for special poker hands (Sept 29 – Nov 2).
  • • L’Outaouais au menu – Taste local cuisine from Oct 30 to Nov 15.

Gaming Promotions & Tournaments

  • • Texas Hold’em Tournaments – Every Monday, Tuesday, and Wednesday.
  • • Mini Blackjack Tournaments – Tuesdays at Bar 7.
  • • Group Specials – Exclusive packages for organized tours.

Exclusive Perks for Casino Privilèges Members

  • • Monthly personalized offers.
  • • Extra points for dining and event participation.
  • • Early access to tickets for major events like New Year’s Eve parties.

Dining & Show Deals

  • • Dinner & Show Packages – Enjoy a gourmet meal at Arôme or Banco plus tickets to a live performance.
  • • Oyster Specials – $2 oysters at Arôme (Sept–Oct).
  • • 15% Discount – On premium theater seats when booking dinner + show.

Top Casino Games at Casino du Lac-Leamy

Casino du Lac-Leamy, located in Gatineau, Quebec, offers a thrilling variety of games for every type of player — from casual visitors to high-stakes enthusiasts. With over 1,800 slot machines and 65+ table games, this casino is a top destination for gaming in Canada.


Slot Machines: Spin & Win Big

Casino du Lac-Leamy features over 1,700 slot games, including:

  • • Huff N’ Even More Puff™ – Progressive jackpot and bonus rounds
  • • Wild-themed, jungle, and magical universes – Giant curved screens and vivid graphics
  • • Classic 3-reel slots and 5-reel video slots – With cascading wins, sticky wilds, and multipliers
  • • Progressive jackpots – Life-changing payouts on select machines

These slots are designed for immersive gameplay, offering exciting themes and high-quality visuals.


Table Games: Classic Casino Action

Enjoy traditional table games with professional dealers or try electronic versions for a modern twist:

  • • Blackjack – Including Free Bet Blackjack and Interactive Blackjack .
  • • Roulette – Classic and electronic formats
  • • Poker – Texas Hold’em, Caribbean Stud, Mississippi Stud, 3 Card Poker, Pai Gow
  • • Craps & Sic Bo – Dice-based excitement
  • • Baccarat – Standard and EZ Baccarat versions
  • • War & I Luv Suits Poker – Unique twists on classic gameplay

Interactive Zone & Electronic Tables

For beginners or tech-savvy players, the Interactive Zone offers:

  • • Electronic Blackjack, Poker, Roulette, Craps, Sic Bo
  • • Touchscreen terminals with tutorials and low minimum bets
  • • A social, high-energy atmosphere perfect for learning or relaxing

Casino du Lac-Leamy Betting Limits

Whether you're a casual player or a high roller, knowing the betting limits can help you choose the right games for your budget. Below is a detailed table of minimum and maximum bets across popular games at the casino.


Game Type Minimum Bet Maximum Bet
Slot Machines $0.10 $5
Blackjack (Standard) $5 $5,000
Free Bet Blackjack $5 $5,000
Roulette (American/Euro) $2 $2,000
Baccarat / EZ Baccarat $10 $5,000
Craps $5 $5,000
Poker (Texas Hold’em) $1/$2 blinds No-limit
Three Card Poker $5 $500
Pai Gow Poker $10 $1,000
Sic Bo $2 $500
Interactive Zone Games $1 $20

Culinary, Wellness, and Hospitality Experience at Casino du Lac-Leamy

Casino du Lac-Leamy in Gatineau, Quebec, is not just a gaming destination; it’s a full-service entertainment complex where fine dining, vibrant nightlife, and luxurious relaxation come together. Visitors can indulge in award-winning gastronomy, unwind in a world-class spa, and enjoy the comfort of a five-star hotel—all under one roof.


The culinary experience begins at Le Baccara, a renowned fine-dining restaurant celebrated for its sophisticated menu and exceptional wine selection. For those who prefer a more casual atmosphere, Arôme Grillades et Fruits de Mer offers premium seafood and grilled specialties with stunning views of Lac de la Carrière, while Banco Bistro serves comforting favorites like pizza, burgers, and poutine. Guests looking for light bites and refreshing drinks can relax at the TGV Lounge, located near the Hilton pool area.


Nightlife at Casino du Lac-Leamy is equally impressive. Bar 7 is the heartbeat of the gaming floor, hosting live music and DJ sets from Thursday to Sunday, creating an energetic vibe for party lovers. For a more exclusive experience, Club Aléa delivers a chic nightclub atmosphere with themed events, while Bacchus Lounge provides a refined setting for cigar enthusiasts, complete with panoramic lake views.


The luxury continues at Hilton Lac-Leamy, a five-star hotel directly connected to the casino. With 349 elegantly designed rooms and suites, the hotel offers indoor and outdoor pools, a fitness center, and conference facilities, making it ideal for both leisure and business travelers. Guests are greeted by stunning glass sculptures by Dale Chihuly, adding an artistic touch to the sophisticated ambiance.


For ultimate relaxation, Amerispa Hilton Lac-Leamy provides a sanctuary of wellness. Visitors can choose from a wide range of treatments, including massages, facials, and body care, complemented by serene water zones. Signature packages like Serenity and Indulgence combine therapeutic massages with specialized beauty treatments, ensuring a rejuvenating experience.


Casino du Lac-Leamy is more than a gaming venue—it’s a destination where gastronomy, entertainment, and luxury converge. Whether you’re savoring gourmet cuisine, dancing the night away, or indulging in spa treatments, every moment here is designed to elevate your experience.


Special Events and Shows at Casino du Lac-Leamy

Casino du Lac-Leamy in Gatineau, Quebec, is not just a hub for gaming excitement but also a premier destination for cultural and entertainment experiences. Every visit becomes unforgettable thanks to a vibrant lineup of concerts, theatrical performances, and themed parties. The casino’s 1,100-seat theater regularly hosts renowned artists and tribute shows that attract fans from across Canada. Guests can enjoy musical evenings featuring Motown classics, disco-themed performances reminiscent of the 70s, and iconic Broadway productions like Chicago. Live music lovers will appreciate concerts by bands such as Honeymoon Suite, Kiss tribute acts, and shows celebrating the legacy of Joe Dassin.

items.title: What payment methods are accepted?
items.answer: Cash, debit and credit cards, as well as bank checks. ATMs are available on-site.

items.title: Are there entertainment shows?
items.answer: Yes, the 1,100-seat theater hosts concerts, comedy shows, and special events.

items.title: Can I book a hotel room near the casino?
items.answer: Yes, the casino is connected to Hilton Lac-Leamy — a 5-star hotel with pools, a spa, and restaurants.
